entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
